content: *here s your supreme stashbuster project this pirate king-inspired striped hat features a crowned skull motif cross-stitched over a tunisian patch and an extended hat crown folded over and secured with a button tips are included for color arrangement and modifications including a beanie style without the folded crown * **sizes** child **teen/adult** adult large to fit head circumference 18-20 /46-51cm **21-22 /53-56cm** 23-24 /58-61cm **finished measurements** circumference 18 /46cm **20 /51cm** 22 /56cm height unfolded 10 5 /26 5cm ** 11 5 /29 25cm** 13 /33cm height folded 7 25 /18 5cm **8 /20 5cm** 8 75 /22cm **gauge** 22 stitches and 24 row over 4 /10cm in single_crochet with larger hook **materials** yarn fingering weight/sock yarn 260yds/240m **350yds/320m** 430yds/400m total broken out into 30yds/25m for patch a few yards for skull motif pinstripe option 70yds/65m **80yds/75m** 90yds/85m of a single color for pinstripes stripes x8 20yds/19m **30yds/28m** 40yds/37m *each* for option *with* pinstripes or stripes x8 30yds/27m **40yds/37m** 50yds/47m *each* for option *without* pinstripes **hooks ** 3 5mm/e or size required to meet gauge for hat body 2 5mm or 2 75mm/c tunisian or standard non-ergonomic hook for patch *if you don t have a tunisian hook the patch can be worked with a standard crochet hook with a straight shaft no enlarged handle buta flattened thumb rest is acceptable ergonomic hooks with wide handles cannot be used for this * **notions ** one 1 25 /32mm button stainless steel t-pins or quilting pins yarn needle scissors or snips
